SYNC & PARTNERSHIPS

SYNC &
PARTNERSHIPS

To further our mission of creating artist sustainability, we thrive on developing forward-thinking opportunities for our roster to expand their audience with partners that build impactful narratives around their music.

WE'VE HAPPILY WORKED WITH

WHAT OUR PARTNERS THINK

This collaboration really brings Monstercat's music and artists to life in SMITE, with authentic audio and special touches Monstercat fans will love. There's something magical about hearing a sick Slushii drop perfectly timed to a burst of damage.

ALEX CANTATORE

Hi-Rez Studios Senior Brand Director of Live Games

Monstercat has become an intrinsic partner in the identity of Rocket League. We have grown as partners together and in their tenth year as a label, we are happy to celebrate all that they have become and what we have become together

MIKE AULT

Audio Director at Psyonix

Monstercat understands that games are the future and they’re one of the few labels that are making licensing easier for the gaming industry.

JAROSLAV BECK

Co-founder & Head of Music at Beat Games

INTERESTED IN BECOMING
A PARTNER? LET'S TALK!

We love collaborating with like-minded entities that want to drive impactful campaigns through music. Have an idea of partnering with Monstercat? Reach out to our partnerships team and let's discuss!

CONTACT US

LOOKING TO LICENSE MUSIC?

Whether you need a music license for your non-profit organization or for a AAA video game development, our Sync and Partnerships team is ready to help! Email us at: licensing@monstercat.com
